---
title: 'User'
description: 'Get users accross both server and client'
icon: 'code'
---

## Get the current user server-side

```tsx
"use server"

import { currentUser } from "@/lib/auth";

const Component = () => {
  const user = useCurrentUser();
};
```

The user object returned server-side:

```tsx
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "image": "https://example.com/image-placeholder.png",
  "id": "dummyUserId1234567890",
  "role": "USER",
  "accounts": [
    {
      "id": "dummyAccountId0987654321",
      "userId": "dummyUserId1234567890",
      "type": "oidc",
      "provider": "google",
      "providerAccountId": "dummyProviderId1234567890",
      "refresh_token": "dummyRefreshToken1234567890",
      "access_token": "dummyAccessToken1234567890",
      "expires_at": 1718729381,
      "token_type": "bearer",
      "scope": "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.email https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.profile openid",
      "id_token": "dummyIdToken1234567890",
      "session_state": null
    }
  ]
}
```

## Get the current user client-side

```tsx
"use client"

import { useCurrentUser } from "@/hooks/use-current-user";

const Component = () => {
  const user = useCurrentUser();
};
```

The user object returned client-side:

```tsx
// client:
{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "image": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
    "id": "dummy12345",
    "role": "USER",
    "accounts": [
        {
            "id": "account12345",
            "userId": "dummy12345",
            "type": "oidc",
            "provider": "google",
            "providerAccountId": "123456789012345678901",
            "refresh_token": "1//0dummyRefreshTokenExample123456",
            "access_token": "ya29.a0AXdummyAccessTokenExample123456",
            "expires_at": 1718729381,
            "token_type": "bearer",
            "scope": "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.email https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.profile openid",
            "id_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjNkNTgwZjBhZjdhY2U2OThhMGNlZTdmMjMwYmNhNTk0ZGM2ZGJiNTUiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..dummyIdTokenExample123456",
            "session_state": null
        }
    ]
}
```
